errors.error_description: The installation instructions list a dependency `numby` which does not exist; the correct package name is `numpy`.
correction_candidates: pip install numpy pandas netCDF4 matplotlib
conda install numpy pandas netCDF4 matplotlib
pip install ilamb --no-deps && pip install numpy pandas netCDF4 matplotlib
pip install num-py pandas netCDF4 matplotlib
errors.golden_answer: pip install numpy pandas netCDF4 matplotlib

errors.error_description: The example command `ilamb-run -configure my_ilamb_file.cfg` uses an incorrect single-dash for a long-form argument. The correct syntax is `--configure`.
